Copper Mountain is one of the biggest ski areas in Colorado. The mountain offers skiing and riding for all levels, world class terrain park features, a variety of lessons, an indoor facility with a skatepark, trampoline floor, and a foam pit.

With that being said shooting for Copper is always a unique experience. One day it's capturing park rats their repeat lesson program with an emphasis on progression in the parks and the next it's working with Pro Skater David Gravette to make content for their indoor skate programs.

This content was used in a variety of contexts including social media, web promotions, print collateral, and event sponsors.
